install.name: bretteleben.de Google Ad Manager Modul
install.author: Andreas Berger
install.license: This extension is released under the GNU/GPL License - http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html
install.description: Displays Ads from Google Ad Manager in module position. Needs the plugin to work!

param.name: pubid
param.label: GAM Publisher ID
param.description: The GoogleAdManager Publisher ID, associated with the current AddSlot, for example ca-pub-9999999999999999

param.name: slot
param.label: GAM AdSlot
param.description: The name of the AdSlot you want to fetch from GoogleAdManager, for example mypage_mysection_left_200

param.name: Attr01a
param.label: Attr01: key
param.description: The key parameter specifies the name of an attribute that should be factored into ad selection for a page.

param.name: Attr01b
param.label: Attr01: value
param.description: The value parameter specifies the attribute value that should be used to select ads.
